thread.title: Heavy rain is causing problems for Wellington traffic
thread.title_full: Heavy rain is causing problems for Wellington traffic

title: Heavy rain is causing problems for Wellington traffic
text:
Heavy rain is causing problems for Wellington traffic Last updated 16:48, February 2 2017 NZTA 
Flooding is causing delays near the Basin Reserve. 
Surface flooding on State Highway 1 near the Basin Reserve is causing some delays to Wellington traffic. 
The flooding is situated near the intersection with Ellice St, as the capital experiences heavy rain on Thursday afternoon. 
Meanwhile, a crash at Nguaranga Gorge is partially blocking the left-hand lane under the rail overbridge, and causing some delays. 
And on State Highway 2 there are reports of a slip near the intersection with Kaitoke Loop Rd, on the Upper Hutt side of Rimutaka Hill. 
The New Zealand Transport Agency is warning motorists to take extra care in the conditions. HEADS UP: SH2 Kaitoke. Reports of a SLIP near the intersection with Kaitoke Loop Rd, on the Upper Hutt side of Rimutaka Hill. #TakeCare ^EL
